lead_paragraph: Russia routed Latvia, 6-1, on Sunday, sealing a spot for the United States in the men’s world hockey quarterfinals. Sweden earned a spot with a 4-1 victory against Switzerland.
snippet: Russia routed Latvia, 6-1, on Sunday, sealing a spot for the United States in the men’s world hockey quarterfinals. Sweden earned a spot with a 4-1 victory against Switzerland.
